H0.text: Which famous media son and mogul joined the board of GlaxoSmithKline as non-executive director in Feb 2009. Lachlan Murdoch

H1.text: Which famous media son and mogul joined the board of GlaxoSmithKline as non-executive director in Feb 2009. Evan Spiegel

H2.text: Which famous media son and mogul joined the board of GlaxoSmithKline as non-executive director in Feb 2009. Robson Walton

H3.text: Which famous media son and mogul joined the board of GlaxoSmithKline as non-executive director in Feb 2009. James Murdoch

A4.text: In February 2009, Murdoch was appointed a non-executive director with the British pharmaceutical company GlaxoSmithKline.
